name: nh-bill-linker
description: Chrome extension to auto-populate form inputs from URL parameters

scripts.package: read -p 'Enter version: ' VERSION && npm version $VERSION --no-git-tag-version && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const m=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('manifest.json','utf8')); m.version='$VERSION'; fs.writeFileSync('manifest.json',JSON.stringify(m,null,2)+'\n')" && git add package.json manifest.json && git commit -m "Version $VERSION" && git tag -a v$VERSION -m "Version $VERSION" && npm run build && rm -f ../nhbilllinker.zip && cd .. && zip -r nhbilllinker.zip nhbilllinker -x '*/node_modules/*' '*/.git/*' '*/.*'
